name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Obama described himself as an eternal optimist. He then explained that he’s the kind of person that sees the country as “half employed.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A man wearing an Obama mask robbed a bank. Either that or Obama has an exciting new plan to reduce the deficit.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Tim Pawlenty endorsed Mitt Romney, calling him a “bedrock conservative.” When he heard this, John McCain said, “I grew up in Bedrock, and I don’t remember seeing him.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: It’s being reported that Rick Perry met his wife when they were in elementary school. There was another boy that liked her too but Perry had him executed.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: The Republican debate was up against Monday night football. It was like NFL vs. LOL.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: I was asked to join a fantasy football team, but I don’t have the time. I’m too busy with my fantasy “Toddlers & Tiaras” team.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Mitt Romney said that President Obama, does not understand that the president doesn’t create jobs. Then Romney went on to explain his plan to create jobs once he’s elected president.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Since Rick Perry has been governor of Texas, 234 criminals have been executed. That’s the difference between Texas and California: In California, those criminals would have been given tryouts for the Raiders.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: According to a new poll, only 55 percent of Americans think President Obama is intelligent. Yeah, that may not sound impressive, but it’s up 55 percent over the last president.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: A new study found that a mother’s diet affects her baby’s allergies. Which can only mean one thing: My mom ate cats.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: A new study found that in the last 30 years, the average home size has increased by 600 square feet. Which is fitting, since in the last 30 years, the average person size has increased by 600 square feet.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: If the tea party really loved America, they wouldn’t have scheduled their debate against the opening night of football, specifically against the Patriots.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It was quite a night. Rick Santorum won the swimsuit contest.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It was the final episode of “Kate Plus Eight.” Now, if you want to hear Kate Gosselin scream at her children, you’ll have to move within a 12-block radius of her house.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: I traveled during the weekend of 9/11 and there was extra security. Not only did I have to take my shoes off, I had to take my feet off too.
